Pink Elephant ‚Äì a venture builder in progressive mental health (psychedelics, telemedicine, wellness) ‚Äì is looking for a senior-level Growth Marketing Manager to scale our multi-product ecosystem across the UK, EU and beyond.
As a CMO, you will own full-stack marketing for Pink Elephant‚Äôs products - from go-to-market strategy and branding to performance-driven growth across channels. This is a high-leverage role for a strategic doer who thrives in ambiguity, builds systems from scratch, and knows how to move fast without breaking trust in regulated industries.
Responsibilities: What You Will Drive
- Portfolio-wide ecosystem launches
- Growth strategy across different channels
- PR strategy, including communications and reputation.
- Leadership & cross-functional collaboration
6-month outcomes
- 1M MAU across the portfolio (not less than 60% organic ‚Äì SMM, SEO);
- At least 10k paying customers across the portfolio across 3 GEOs;
- Fully packed marketing team that can handle minimum 6 portfolio projects simultaneously.

Job Title: VC investment company Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
About Us
We are a dynamic and fast-growing family office headquartered in the scenic surroundings of Limassol managing a diverse portfolio of ventures across multiple sectors . With exciting growth on the horizon and a focus on cross-border projects, we‚Äôre looking for a Russian-speaking CFO to join our close-knit leadership team and help drive strategic financial excellence across all areas of the business.
The Role
As CFO, you will be the financial cornerstone of our operations‚Äîreporting directly to the principal and working closely with project leads across various verticals. This is a rare opportunity to be embedded in the heart of a family office, influencing high-level decisions and shaping the financial future of a diverse investment portfolio.
This is not a traditional corporate finance role. We‚Äôre seeking someone agile, commercially minded, and comfortable juggling multiple high-value projects simultaneously. You must be a strong teamplayer in a family-type small team, where everyone is handling everything. You‚Äôll be both strategic and hands-on whether building financial models for a new venture, overseeing budget planning, or liaising with international partners.
Key Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Lead all financial planning, budgeting, forecasting, and cash flow management activities
‚Ä¢ Treasury management
‚Ä¢ Managing relations with external providers for accounting, audit (big4), legal
‚Ä¢ Manage reporting, compliance, and regulatory requirements across jurisdictions
‚Ä¢ Oversee day-to-day financial operations including accounting, audit, and tax planning, risk management
‚Ä¢ Develop financial models for new business initiatives
‚Ä¢ Liaise with external advisors, banks, and auditors both locally and internationally
‚Ä¢ Work closely with project managers and investment teams to ensure financial discipline across projects
‚Ä¢ Translate financial insights into clear and actionable recommendations for the principal
What We‚Äôre Looking For
‚Ä¢ Fluent in Russian (spoken and written) ‚Äì essential for liaising with stakeholders and partners
‚Ä¢ 10+ years of progressive experience in finance, accounting, or corporate strategy
‚Ä¢ CFA qualification is a must. ACA or ACCA or equivalent internationally recognized accounting qualification would be an advantage
‚Ä¢ Previous experience working in VC/PE funds or with family offices, private investment firms, or multi-project environments preferred
‚Ä¢ Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate financial ideas clearly to non-financial stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced, evolving environment
‚Ä¢ High integrity, discretion, and a strong sense of ownership and leadership
